availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: William H. Cairns (Boyd County, Kentucky, manufacturer, pvt 6th Ky Cav (U.S.A.))

body.p: Boyd County, Kentucky, manufacturer and soldier. Native of Scotland. Son of Jane Cairns. Manufacturer in Boyd County in 1860. Served in the 6th Kentucky Volunteer Cavalry Regiment (U.S.A.) as private from February 14, 1864, to August 1865.

ab.bibl:
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Boyd County, Ashland, p. 834.
Compiled Service Records of Volunteer Union Soldiers who Served in Organizations From State of Kentucky, NARA RG 94, Microfilm Series M397, Roll 0062.
